page.title: 05Dores/Abriachan_Wave Energy
page.content: The {Wave Energy Project }started in 1977.It is trying to test {a machine} to harness the{ energy }generated by the waves.{Loch Ness}was chosen because its location met the {Project' {s}requirements. The {Wave Energy Project}has been very successful so far.{The Wave Energy {Project}uses a lot of electronic equipment.{Gavin Finlay}goes out on the loch every day to check and maintain the equipment.The funding for the{Project}is due to run out soon and its future depends on renewed funding becoming available. { }
